name: Multisweeper
description:
Minesweeper, but multiplayer

Grab a friend and play online or play against the AI locally

Game Modes Classic

Turn-based minesweeper: A Relaxed experience

Intel

Strategic sweeping: Gain points corresponding to the uncovered number. High risk; high rewards

Rush

Real-time unbridled chaos: Most cells cleared wins, but hitting a mine is an instant loss. The chef's recommendation

Music

4-chiptunes-adventure
